dcterms:creator: J. Perner
S. R. Leekam
H. Wimmer
dcterms:description: The Unexpected Contents Task, also known as the Smarties Task, assesses a participant's understanding of a protagonist's false belief about the contents of a container that is inconsistent with its label.
dcterms:title: Unexpected Contents Task (aka Smarties Task)

dcterms:creator: H. Wimmer
J. Perner
dcterms:description: The Unexpected Transfer Task, also known as the Maxi task or Sally–Anne test, evaluates a participant's understanding of a protagonist's false belief regarding the location of an object after an unexpected transfer.
dcterms:title: Unexpected Transfer Task (aka the “Maxi task” or “Sally–Anne” test)

dcterms:creator: F. Quesque
Y. Rossetti
dcterms:description: A general reference to false-belief tasks designed to assess Theory of Mind capabilities in individuals.
dcterms:title: False-belief tasks
